main event: An observer reported seeing a whitish-yellow fireball-type object that exhibited unusual and erratic flight patterns for 20 minutes in Lansing, Michigan.
interesting points: The object was very bright and disappeared only to later reappear,The object was observed after sunset while twilight was still visible,The object's color was described as glittering white with an irregular elongated shape,It emitted a faint whirring noise during the sighting,The observer was a 12-year-old male who had a particular interest in aerial phenomena.
witness description: The observer is a 12-year-old male interested in aerial phenomena.
